text:
="preserve">Student transport is the transporting of students to and from schools and school events.
Types.
In the United States, this is by school bus. In the Netherlands, this is by walking. In the United Kingdom this is by car, bus and/or bicycle.
Crossing roads.
Students walking are assisted to cross roads by lollipop men or lollipop ladies. In the United States this is known as crossguard.
